title: Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic
content:
caged her for a reason.

Follow the secret passage

We uncovered a secret passage in the Thorm Mausoleum. The relic must be further inside.

We uncovered a secret passage in the Thorm Mausoleum. Balthazar must be inside. We encountered a group of patrolling skeletons who likely serve Balthazar. They mentioned the temple's shadowy defenders. We encountered Balthazar's undead servants. They have barricaded themselves in a room as they prepare to defend their master.

Talk to Balthazar

We defeate
